channel.title: Fixture Monkey on
channel.description: Recent content in Fixture Monkey on

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: sectionStart v.1.0.10 # Fix setting object field by any other type. Refactor does not throw exception when it cannot generate, the next ArbitraryIntrospector will be used. Add handling when using an ArbitraryIntrospector that does not match the property type. Add a log entry if the property is of a container type, and throw an exception if the property is of a concrete type. sectionEnd sectionStart v1.0.9 # Fix the addExceptGenerateClass to be unaffected by the specific ArbitraryIntrospector used
